item.content:encoded:
Hace meses que ten√≠a que haber escrito sobre este juego, quer√≠a que fuese un post digno del juego, pero como eso es imposible, simplemente os contar√© de qu√© va, por qu√© ten√©is que comprarlo y por qu√© es mejor que el GTA. Por cierto, no cuento nada que no pod√°is saber, as√≠ que no hay peligro de spoilers

¬øDe qu√© trata?

Es el a√±o 1960, tu avioneta se estrella en medio del oc√©ano cuando volv√≠as de camino a casa y lo √∫nico que puedes ver es la luz de una especia de faro. Nadas hacia √©l y all√≠ una batisfera te lleva al fondo del mar hasta una ciudad oculta bajo el mar: Rapture.

Pronto te das cuenta que algo extra√±o ha pasado all√≠ y la √∫nica persona que parece poder ayudarte es una voz a trav√©s de la radio. Ver v√≠deo

Gr√°ficos y m√∫sica

Bioshock utiliza el Unreal 3 Engine para los gr√°ficos y el resultado es espectacular. El realismo del agua, que se convierte en un personaje m√°s, erosiona el decorado, gotea y se filtra con un nivel de detalle nunca visto. La ciudad sumergida de arquitectura Art Dec√≥ en decadencia, recuerda a veces a Gotham City con sus grandes estatuas y edificios opulentos. Si a esto le sumamos una cuidad√≠sima banda sonora y efectos de sonido, el resultado es una atm√≥sfera envolvente, inquietante y ca√≥tica que te colocar√° en el papel del personaje hasta tal punto de hacerte saltar con alg√∫n que otro susto.

Los Big Daddy no te lo pondr√°n nada f√°cil

La m√∫sica consta de piezas instrumentales creadas para el juego por Garry Schyman y conocidas canciones de los a√±os 50 y 60 que producir√°n una extra√±a sensaci√≥n de familiaridad e inquietud junto a los di√°logos y lamentos de los personajes.

Conclusi√≥n

Bioshock es un shooter primera persona (pegar tiros a todo lo que se mueve) en el que adem√°s tienes que utilizar la l√≥gica y resolver puzzles. Pero gran parte del atractivo del juego es la atm√≥sfera, la historia, el debate entre la moral y la √©tica, el caos y la decadencia de un lugar que ha vivido su momento dorado y personajes con una historia y una motivaci√≥n. Todas las decisiones que tomemos tendr√°n consecuencias. Por todo esto y por lo que he disfrutado jugando a Bioshock, lo hacen para m√≠, el mejor juego que he visto en mi vida.

¬øQu√© es lo que ha pasado aqu√≠?

Para los que consideran que no se merece un 10 porque tiene juego online, all√° ellos. Para m√≠ es simplemente perfecto y no le hace falta nada m√°s, simplemente se trata de preferencias y gustos de cada uno. ¬øQue por qu√© creo que es mejor que GTA? GTA IV es m√°s de lo mismo, la historia y la novedad ya la tuvimos con la tercera entrega hace 7 a√±os. Bioshock cuenta una historia densa, con unos personajes complejos, matar o dejar vivir no es una elecci√≥n f√°cil, son juegos distintos. GTA IV tiene unos buenos gr√°ficos y una gran campa√±a de publicidad alrededor, pero ya lo hemos visto todo. Bioshock supera con creces a GTA para los que quieran algo m√°s que cumplir misiones, conducir coches y pegar tiros sin remordimientos.

item.content:encoded:
Si le echas un vistazo al librito que viene con el juego, ver√°s que es como una gu√≠a tur√≠stica, muy en l√≠nea con el humor de Rockstar, pero si lo que buscas es que te explique los distintos modos de juego online, lo llevas claro. Pero parece ser que se han dado cuenta de que se les olvid√≥ incluirlo y han distribuido un PDF que te explica en qu√© consiste cada modo, incluso algunos trucos y consejos para esta funci√≥n. As√≠ que ya sabes, si no sabes muy bien qu√© hacer, aqu√≠ est√° la soluci√≥n.

Os pego el contenido (en ingl√©s) despu√©s del salto:

Basics
‚Ä¢ To access multiplayer in-game:
1) Press Up on the directional pad to access your mobile phone
2) Toggle to Multiplayer and press ( for PS3 or for Xbox 360) to accept
3) Choose from Player Match, Ranked, or Party Mode
4) Select from one of 14 multiplayer games and press ( for PS3 or for Xbox 360) to enter the multiplayer lobby
‚Ä¢ The lobby is the meeting point for all players before starting a multiplayer game. Here you can see a list of who is playing and change your mode and character model options.
‚Ä¢ To invite friends to multiplayer, you use your in-game mobile phone to look them up and then call them. (For Xbox 360 users, you can also select and invite friends via Xbox LIVE.)

Game Mode Descriptions
‚Ä¢ Player Match ‚Äì Results here do not count towards your GTA IV multiplayer ranking. There are separate leader boards for these modes. With Custom Matches, players can host matches where they can reserve spots for friends. Players can be invited into games in progress.
‚Ä¢ Ranked ‚Äì In ranked games, the more player cash a player wins, the higher their rank increases. After gaining a rank, the player unlocks more clothing options for their character. Players cannot invite friends into ranked games.
‚Ä¢ Party Mode (2-8 players) – Players can invite their friends to a party mode by using the in-game mobile phone. (For Xbox 360 users, you can also select and invite friends via Xbox LIVE.) The players spawn in a ‚Äúparty area‚Äù. After the host, or ‚Äúparty leader‚Äù, selects a game mode, all players in the party will join that game mode. In team modes, the party will play against another party. In competitive modes, the game will be played as normal ‚Äì but only players in the party will be involved, with other people allowed to join the mode until all slots have been taken.

Lobby Information
‚Ä¢ The lobby system will only proceed if the host AND at least half of the players in the lobby are readied up. If you want to wait for more players stay un-readied in protest.
‚Ä¢ Half of the lobby will need to manually boot a person in order to kick them from the game. In the lobby, you will be able to tell how many people have voted by the flashing icons next to their name. You can also choose to boot people in-game using the phonebook in your mobile phone.
‚Ä¢ If you do not want any strangers to join your team then you and your friends should enter games via party mode. This mode restricts teams to only people that are in your party. Party mode will also only allow you to play with other parties of similar sizes.
‚Ä¢ All players can invite their friends to join them. This can be done in the lobby or in the middle of games by using their mobile phone. The only exception to this is in Party Mode or in Xbox LIVE Ranked Matches.
‚Ä¢ Custom match allows you to reserve private spots for your friends. You can also use this to ensure that you are the host of the match by selecting private slots to be > 0.

Settings
‚Ä¢ Auto-aim is an awesome feature that is often misunderstood. It is intended to speed up the game by focusing aiming to a smaller area. It WILL NOT level the playing field. Turning this off will slow the pace of the game down and make melee combat, drive-bys, and sniper action more effective.
‚Ä¢ If you are new to GTA multiplayer requesting that the location setting be restricted to the smaller areas (Prison, Docks, Charge Island, Colony Island, Airport, and Bohan) is the best way to go. The larger areas can be very overwhelming for new players.
‚Ä¢ Blip settings are another great feature players can use to tailor their GTA online experience. Changing these from All to Leader, Near, or Far is almost like increasing the difficulty setting – we advise using a time limit over a point limit when using the latter two.
‚Ä¢ We advise using the proximity voice chat setting to combat against players attempting to dominate the in-game chat with their loud family members, TVs, and music. If you need to talk trash to someone across the map with this on you can simply call them up on your in-game mobile phone.

Tips and Highlights
‚Ä¢ All of the non-Cooperative game modes are money based. Only a team or a player can win. The one with the most money will always be the winner. In time limit games, the winner will be the one with the most money when the timer expires. In point limit games, the winner will be the one who reaches/surpasses the point limit first.
‚Ä¢ There are 10 levels of achievement. Achievements allow you to unlock more options for clothing and characters.
‚Ä¢ Taunts ‚Äì players can press (L1 for PS3 or LB for Xbox 360) to perform a context sensitive taunt directed at the other players.
‚Ä¢ You can talk to your friends on headsets during the modes. You can even have a one to one conversation with a friend by calling him/her through your in-game mobile phone.
‚Ä¢ In Player Match mode, you can vote on what the next game will be using the in-game mobile phone.
‚Ä¢ Players can set waypoints for other teammates in vehicles.
‚Ä¢ A player‚Äôs gamertag will disappear whenever that player crouches or uses cover.
